mapper.sql: SELECT DOM_NO AS domNo, DOM_NAME AS domName, DOM_CONTENT AS domContent, DOM_ADDR AS domAddr, (FILE_PATH || '/' || CHANGE_NAME) AS imagePath
SELECT DOM_ATTACHMENT_NO domAttachmentNo, REF_DNO refDno, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CREATE_DATE createDate, TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT.STATUS status
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DOM WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
FROM TB_DOM JOIN TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT ON (DOM_NO = REF_DNO) WHERE TB_DOM.STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DOM_NO DESC
FROM TB_DOM JOIN TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT ON (DOM_NO = REF_DNO) WHERE TB_DOM.STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT.STATUS = 'Y' AND DOM_NO = #{domNo}
FROM TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT JOIN TB_DOM ON (REF_DNO = DOM_NO) WHERE TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DOM ( DOM_NO, DOM_NAME, DOM_CONTENT, DOM_ADDR ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{domName}, #{domContent}, #{domAddr} )

INSERT INTO TB_DOM_ATTACHMENT ( DOM_ATTACHMENT_NO, REF_DNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOM_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_DOM_NO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
